message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. I believe it will greatly enhance your experience and add value to your life. For this exceptional item, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $95. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it's significantly below its market value of $100. I trust you'll find its worth exceeds the investment. Looking forward to your positive response.
